AUTOMOD29: Block newly created accounts from joining your server.
AUTOMOD31: Allow block specific words, phrases, or regular expressions.
AUTOMOD33: Prevents excessive use of CAPSLOCK in messages on your server.
AUTOMOD35: Prevents users from setting their username or nickname to be listed higher in the user list
AUTOMOD37: Prevents users from attempting to ping @everyone / @here.
AUTOMOD39: Block external links from being sent on your server.
AUTOMOD41: Block invitations from being sent from servers within your server.
AUTOMOD43: Prevents the excessive use of emojis in your server messages.
AUTOMOD45: Set a maximum number of lines users messages can be
AUTOMOD47: Stops mention spammers from performing mass-mentions of users (or roles)
AUTOMOD49: Prevents the excessive use of spoilers in your server messages.
AUTOMOD51: Filter messages, links and attachments with NSFW content on your server.
AUTOMOD53: Stops spam from repeated or very fast messages on your server.
AUTOMOD55: Prevent visual pollution with Zalgo characters on your server
AUTOMOD59:
This is Hope's `Auto-Mod` settings panel.

Feel free to navigate through the menus based on the module of your choice by clicking on the selector below.

If you have any questions on how to configure, please [click here](https://github.com/klaus-2/HopeBot/wiki/Auto-Mod) and check out our complete auto-mod guide.
AUTOMOD61:
`INFORMATIONS`

**PUNISHMENT**
{{Action}}

**TIME**
{{Time}}

**WARNINGS LIMIT**
{{Limit}}

**GLOBAL WHITELISTED CHANNELS**
<#{{IgnoreChannel}}

**GLOBAL WHITELISTED ROLES**
<@&{{IgnoreRole}}

**GLOBAL WHITELISTED USERS**
<@{{IgnoreUser}}

`SETTINGS`
**{{prefix}}auto-mod punishment <kick | ban>**
‚ùØ Sets a punishment type for when the user reaches 3 warnings.
**{{prefix}}auto-mod time <time>**
‚ùØ Sets the time the user will be muted when he receives the second warning.
**{{prefix}}auto-mod limit <quantity>**
‚ùØ Sets the limit of warnings a user can receive before getting the final punishment (kick or ban).
**{{prefix}}auto-mod <channel | user | role> <add | remove> <id/mention>**
‚ùØ Adds or Removes an exception to blacklist in the whitelist.
AUTOMOD63:
`STATUS`
{{stats}}

**PUNISHMENT**
{{Action}}

**LIMIT**
{{Limit}}

**WHITELISTED USERS**
{{Allowed}}

`SETTINGS`
**{{prefix}}anti-alt <enable | disable>**
‚ùØ Enables or disables the addon.
**{{prefix}}anti-alt <add | remove> <userid>**
‚ùØ Whitelist alt accounts of your choice or Remove an alt account off the whitelist.
**{{prefix}}anti-alt limit <days>**
‚ùØ Set the amount of days of the alt age.
**{{prefix}}anti-alt punishment <kick | ban>**
‚ùØ Pick the action fired towards the alt.
**{{prefix}}anti-alt localts <days>**
‚ùØ Find all alts in the guild with the provided account age (days).
**{{prefix}}anti-alt locjoin <days>**
‚ùØ Find all youngest alts with the provided join date (days)
AUTOMOD65:
`STATUS`
{{stats}}

**BADWORD LIST**
{{List}}

**WHITELISTED CHANNELS**
<#{{BadwordsChannels}}

**WHITELISTED ROLES**
<@&{{BadwordsRole}}

**WHITELISTED USERS**
<@{{BadwordsUser}}

`SETTINGS`
**{{prefix}}anti-badwords set <0-3>**
‚ùØ Enables or disables the addon.
**{{prefix}}anti-badwords time <time>**
‚ùØ Set the duration of the warning the user will receive.
**{{prefix}}anti-badwords <add | remove> <word>**
‚ùØ Add or Remove a word to the blacklist.
**{{prefix}}anti-badwords <channel | user | role> <add | remove> <id/mention>**
‚ùØ Add or Remove an exception to blacklist in the whitelist.

`NOTE`
> If the configuration of this module is not defined, then it will use the values of the **GLOBAL SETTINGS** from Auto-Mod.
